entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce trim-friendly APIs for controlling HTTPS Configuration support #47567
  • SignalR.Common tests with Japanese characters fail on MacOS 11.6.8 #47566
  • Run ASP.Net Core on Mobile OSs like Ionic capacitor #47565
  • [Route Tooling] Versioned Routes #47564
  • ASP.NET core 6.0 Kestrel ASPNETCORE_URLS env variable not working when set from Process.StartInfo.EnvironmentVariables #47563
  • Update TypedResults.Stream to include optional enableRangeProcessing parameter, or change documentation. #47557
  • Blazor Sections don't handle SectionName correctly #47552
  • Adding external dll dependency in Blazor WASM Shared project causing exception when deployed in IIS ! #47551

Closed

  • Enable CA1512 in `HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions.cs` #47553
  • Dotnet hosting bundle 6.0.15 fails with error: 0x80070643, AspNetCoreModuleV2_x64 #47534
  • Need a secure way to do client cache storage with ServerPrerendered #47556
  • Behavior is different to what is documented - IFormCollection.Item[String] Property #36712
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Events do not work in shadow dom #46961
    Discussions
  • Sanitize 0x7F for content disposition header value #47027
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Try skipping tests with Japanese chars #47560
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Added enableRangeProcessing parameter to TypedResult.Stream(...) #47558
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Control streaming SSR per subtree #47555
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-united, 8.0-preview3
  • Set exception handler feature in developer exception page #47554
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Signify bodylessness for HTTP/2 extended CONNECTs #47550
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Fix verb in route template with gRPC transcoding #47162
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] Fix sending to another client from OnConnectedAsync #47204
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 7.0.6
  • [release/6.0] Pass /norestart to Hosting Bundle nested bundles #47545
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.17
  • [release/7.0] Pass /norestart to Hosting Bundle nested bundles #47543
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 7.0.6
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2d4f208` to `b5fd99b` #47528
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.6
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `2d4f208` to `b5fd99b` #47527
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.17
  • Update branding to 6.0.17 #47561
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.17
  • Update branding to 7.0.6 #47562
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.6
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Sanitize 0x7F in Content-Disposition filename #47549
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #47114
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • Update SDK #47540
    area-signalr
  • Add metrics to hosting and Kestrel #46834
    area-runtime
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
